code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{Button,Container,Grid,Paper,TextField,Typography}from'@mui/material';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Calculator=()=>{const[input,setInput]=useState('');const[result,setResult]=useState('');const handleButtonClick=value=>{setInput(prev=>prev+value);};const handleClear=()=>{setInput('');setResult('');};const handleCalculate=()=>{try{setResult(eval(input).toString());}catch(error){setResult('Error');}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Container,{className:"flex justify-center items-center h-screen bg-gray-100",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Paper,{className:"p-6 rounded-lg shadow-lg w-full max-w-md",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Typography,{variant:"h4",className:"text-center mb-4",children:"Calculator"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,value:input,className:"mb-4",InputProps:{readOnly:true}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(TextField,{variant:"outlined",fullWidth:true,value:result,className:"mb-4",InputProps:{readOnly:true}}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Grid,{container:true,spacing:2,children:[['7','8','9','/','4','5','6','*','1','2','3','-','0','.','=','+'].map(value=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:3,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",fullWidth:true,className:"h-16",onClick:()=>value==='='?handleCalculate():handleButtonClick(value),children:value})},value)),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Grid,{item:true,xs:6,children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Button,{variant:"contained",color:"secondary",fullWidth:true,className:"h-16",onClick:handleClear,children:"Clear"})})]})]})});};export default Calculator;
